headline: Uber’s AV Labs Push Meets Growing Robotaxi And Regulatory Pressures
summary: Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) has created a new AV Labs division focused on autonomous vehicle technology and large-scale deployment. The company has started public road testing of fully driverless robotaxis, developed with Lucid Group and Nuro, in select markets. A federal judge allowed New York City’s new tipping law for delivery apps to take effect, adding compliance requirements for Uber Eats. A Dutch court ruled that Uber drivers can be classified as independent contractors, setting an...
